description:
DO YOU WANT BUILD A DYNAMIC WEBSITE?

LEARN THE LANGUAGES HTML/HTML5, PHP & MYSQL FROM SCRATCH?

AND BECOME A TOP WEB DEVELOPER?

JOIN THIS COURSE AND MAKE YOUR NEXT WEBSITE! PIECE BY PIECE!

This course is suitable for beginners but also for those who want to refresh their knowledge. Ideal for new web developers that want to get started with a strong foundation. You don't need any experience to take this course. This Course course allows you to learn at your pace without spending entire days at a time away from the office or your college.

Throughout the course, we'll be building a handful of complete dynamic website step-by-step, personal or professional, and be transformed from a total beginner to a confident webmaster: I think you'll be excited to learn!

This course includes basic introductory lessons to How Install-Simulate a Webserver on your PC. You learn commands and techniques for creating a Table, Adding new Images, create Form, Links, Input methods, Lists methods, div tag, Iframe, AppChace, insert a Javascript, use the Variables, Data Types, create Arrays, Concatenation Operators, Associative Array, Two Dimensional Array, and more with easy. You will become familiar with the functions in PHP and MySQL. Learn how to Adding pages to your site, web page customization, create the homepage, Managing your website, use the editor Brackets, insert Audio and Video Input, Geolocation, WebStorage, Drag&Drop, Canvas... creating a professional dynamic website!

The course is presented via an intuitive, easy-to-use interface, allowing you to learn at your own pace.

ARE YOU READY TO LEARN THE 4 MOST POPULAR WEB LANGUAGES? AND BUILD YOUR FIRST DYNAMIC WEBSITE NOW!!


The course package:

- 66 video tutorials (about 10.00 hours total)
- Exercises tutorials: step by step, how create your HTML & PHP website
- 4 Levels: Base, Intermediate, Advanced and Expert
- Videos available, 24 hours on 24
- Learn when you want (every day or week-end)
- Build a Dynamic Website with MySQL and HTML5!


The course outline:

- What Is HTML/HTML5?
- History and HTML5 vs Flash
- Brackets Editor HTML
- Head, meta tag, paragraph
- Links, CSS, Images
- Comment, DIV & Span, Indentation
- Tables, Lists, Forms and Input
- AppChace, Entities, Javascript
- Iframes, Audio & Video, Drag & Drop
- WebStorage, Geolocation and Canvas
- Install a Webserver
- The function ECHO
- Use Comments
- Variables and Data Types
- Arrays, Associative Array, Two Dimensional Array
- IF function... and more!
title: Learn HTML/HTML5/PHP/MySQL from Scratch
